thread.title: Pregnant Beyoncé shows off her growing baby bump in unseen Oscars photos
thread.title_full: Pregnant Beyoncé shows off her growing baby bump in unseen Oscars photos - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Pregnant Beyoncé shows off her growing baby bump in unseen Oscars photos
text:
Pregnant Beyoncé shows off her growing baby bump in unseen Oscars photos Singer shows off her twin bump in a figure-hugging green dress Share Comments By Jessica Gibb 17:45, 28 FEB 2017 Celebs (Photo: Beyonce.com) Share Comments Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email Beyoncé might be pregnant with twins – but that didn’t stop her enjoying Oscars weekend.
And now the 35 year old has shared new photos of her incredible figure-hugging outfit.
In the snaps, Bey flaunts her pregnancy curves in a long green dress.
She sticks her bum out as she pouts to the camera.
Beyoncé flaunts her incredible pregnancy curves (Photo: Beyonce.com) Beyonce put her growing baby bump on show in a figure hugging dress during a night out with Jay Z over the weekend.
The superstar couple - who are already proud parents to daughter Blue Ivy Carter - revealed earlier this month that they're expecting twins together, and the singer was glowing at a pre-Oscars party recently .
Bey's bump was clearly on show in a fitted dress, as she carried her coat while leaving the Weistein party at the Montage in Beverly Hills.
She wore a figure-hugging green dress (Photo: Beyonce.com) She was accompanied by her man Jay at the bash, and he looked dapper in a sharp suit.
Their appearance came days after Beyonce pulled out of her performance at Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival after being told by doctors to reduce her schedule during her pregnancy.
In a statement posted on the event's Facebook page, it was confirmed that she will follow the advice and as such won't be headlining this year - but she will return for 2018.
Bey partied at the Oscars this weekend (Photo: Beyonce.com) "Following the advice of her doctors to keep a less rigorous schedule in the coming months, Beyonce has made the decision to forgo performing at the 2017 Coachella Valley Music Arts Festival," the message read.
There was hope she would be able to appear at Coachella after she performed live at the Grammys earlier this month.
